mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.class_num AS "classNum", a.class_name AS "className", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_classinfo( id, class_num, class_name, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{classNum}, #{className}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_classinfo SET class_num = #{classNum}, class_name = #{className}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
